nodes.text: The Quesna system was a star system located in the Toblain sector of the Outer Rim Territories that contained the Quesna Base, and a planet that was behind it.

During the Galactic Civil War, the system was the site of the Imperial Cargo Facility 2, Quesna Base. The station was where Emon Azzameen was arrested and imprisoned for "crimes against the Empire" before being rescued by Ace Azzameen.
